scripts.build: for d in ./move/*/; do cd $d; sui move build --lint --warnings-are-errors; cd ../../; done
scripts.test: for d in ./move/*/; do sui move test --path $d; done
scripts.coverage:
echo 'Axelar Move Coverage Report

' > .coverage.info ; for d in ./move/*/; do ./sui/target/debug/sui move test --path $d --coverage; ./sui/target/debug/sui move coverage summary --path $d >> .coverage.info; done
